title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2520.2 - Amendment of codes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2520.2 - Amendment of codes

State Regulations

Sections 1 through 66, inclusive, of the code of the Rent

Stabilization Association of New York City, Inc., and sections 1 through 64, inclusive, of the code of the Metropolitan Hotel Industry Stabilization

Association, Inc., as last amended, are deleted in their entirety, and sections
2520.1 through
2531.9
of this Subchapter, inclusive, are adopted, and this Code is known as the Rent Stabilization Code. Chapter VIII of this Subtitle is known as Rent Stabilization Regulations, and
divided into Subchapter A - Emergency Tenant Protection Regulations, consisting
of Parts 2500-2511; and Subchapter B - Rent Stabilization Code, consisting of
new Parts 2520-2531. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2520.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
